alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 9:08PM CDT until August 05 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN TEXAS...SOUTHEASTERN CIMARRON...NORTHERN SHERMAN AND NORTHEASTERN DALLAM COUNTIES... At 907 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Griggs to 17 miles southeast of Boise City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Stratford, Griggs, Conlen and Texhoma. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
